select shelf.dy_sku, lp.product_name as name, shelf.owner, sum(shelf.num) as num from l_up_shelf_product shelf left join l_productions lp on shelf.dy_sku = lp.dy_sku
shelf.dy_sku like CONCAT('%', #{sku}, '%')
or lp.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
or shelf.owner like CONCAT('%', #{owner}, '%')
group by shelf.dy_sku, lp.product_name, shelf.owner order by 4 desc

select shelf.dy_sku, lp.product_name as name, shelf.owner, sum(shelf.num) as num from l_up_shelf_product shelf left join l_productions lp on shelf.dy_sku = lp.dy_sku where shelf.owner = #{username}
and shelf.dy_sku like CONCAT('%', #{sku}, '%')
and lp.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
group by shelf.dy_sku, lp.product_name, shelf.owner order by 4 desc
